subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: [RTSC] RT-EVP
author: Mvanah Maloti
full_text:
--0-2082433186-1288033458=:7289
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

CB brings up a great point in that each user has their own input and indivi=
dual "key" regarding how well a certain device is going to work for them. I=
 think the same holds true for the impetus, energy and intelligence behind =
the=A0GB=A0phenomenon...certainly "they" have just as much to do with it as=
 "we" do...(perhaps even more so!). 
=A0
I feel it's at least a=A03 PART dy=
namic and one which exists between the device itself, the operator and thos=
e on the other side. 
=A0
I'm in agreement that what works best for one mig=
ht be horrible=A0for another (& vice versa)=A0and this is something we coul=
d all do well to keep in mind - perhaps especially myself as I've been quit=
e harsh with a few devices in the past and my own opinion and experience wi=
th them is the furthest thing from the "holy work" or final word on the sub=
ject. Like everyone else here=A0I experiment, conduct my sessions, record m=
y work and file my research in effort to find what works best FOR ME and ga=
rners the=A0greatest results. 
=A0
Part of what makes this field, our indiv=
idual work and collective efforts so exciting and progressive is that each =
researcher brings their own unique=A0approach and combined experience to th=
e table. I don't think ITC research would ever grow or progress=A0if everyo=
ne used the same devices or recorded their sessions in the same way, natura=
lly. 
=A0
That said, if you're still interested in testing and experimentin=
g with=A0this device to see if you like it or not, Michael, I'd be happy to=
 send you mine to experiment with if you're open=A0to paying for postage an=
d return shipping. I'd rather see the devices in my care and the equipment =
I've invested in be actively used or sold or at least scrapped for parts to=
 create other devices when and where possible. Practically any ITC device c=
an get some kind of results and who knows? Perhaps the RT-EVP will work bet=
ter for you than it has for me...you might even fall in love with it and be=
 able to show me all the=A0things I've missed! =A0
=A0
Best, 
Jerome
=A0
=
=A0
